parameters.definition: Grams of sugar per slice of cheesecake
Calories per slice of caramel cake
Grams of sugar per slice of caramel cake
Minimum ratio of cheesecake slices to caramel cake slices
Minimum number of caramel cake slices to be eaten

description: A competitive eater challenges himself to eat slices of cheesecake and caramel cake. Each slice of cheesecake contains \param{CalCheesecake} calories and \param{SugarCheesecake} grams of sugar. Each slice of caramel cake contains \param{CalCaramelCake} calories and \param{SugarCaramelCake} grams of sugar. He prefers cheesecake and decides to eat at least \param{CheeseCaramelRatio} times as many slices of cheesecake as caramel cake. However, he must also eat at least \param{MinCaramel} slices of caramel cake. If he can consume at most \param{MaxCalories} calories in one day, how many slices of each cake should he eat to maximize the total amount of sugar he consumes?
